we were talking about about
ABC very quickly once we started playing
with this and actually using and
practice over and over again we found
that the llm had a real tendency to to
go down these rabbit holes where you
know now that we gave it this tool to
use to say I want to move on to the next
question it was hard to get it to call
that tool the appropriate amount of time
llms just loved chitchatting and asking
follow-up questions and digging down

about things that they hear uh and so
this resulted in sort of a reluctance to
move on to the next question uh and if
we forced it too hard then we would
eliminate its ability to improvise at
all which is obviously not what we want
so we introduced at this point an
additional background agent that's
listening to the conversation and
running a separate side thread to decide
with a totally separate call to a te
nonvoice text based llm based on the
transcript right now do we think we're
kind of like off track or on track and
we call this the drift detector agent
and so this is like a totally separate
prompt and it's just looking through the
history and it's trying to decide how
are we doing are we on topic are we off
topic is it has the question question
we're trying to ask been answered and is
it time to move on and when we get back
a result that says pretty strongly it's
time to move on we can prevent this sort
of rabbit ho holding from continuing any
further by like forcing the tool use and
you know flipping the flag on the API
call to open AI to say okay you have to
use this tool now and have to move on to
the next
question broadly it's pretty hard to get
these humanlike interviews tuned into
the right place they are always either
like following up too little or
following up too much
you want them to be able to rephrase
questions but sometimes they rephrase

know what the whole interview is going
to be like um and also this linear flow
the only thing I can do is decide to go

restrictive it's either digging in
really hard into the question it's on or
it's saying okay give me what's next um
and this sort of limited the the natural
flow of the conversation
and so we introduced some things to try
and correct for this even further um the
first is we added goals and priorities
as a first class concept uh in the sort
of plan for the interview so rather than
just telling the llm here's this the
question you're asking right now we're
telling it the why behind the question
so that it can be informed when it's
trying to rephrase or informed when it's
like trying to decide how to ask
followup questions um and then we
introduce yet another side agent uh
which we call our next question agent
and this guy is just in charge of
figuring out what should we ask next and
so the first point is the this is what
the goals look like this is a screenshot
from our admin interface but you know we
have this question that it's that it's

without the goals you know it it may

but it's going to ask something pretty

knows like if it's going to be satis
ified after your answer like okay I
understand this person's
responsibilities and tasks are not
sometimes it's going to be satisfied
sometimes it won't so instead we add in

activities and a medium priority goal of
we'd like to be able to start to sus out

the implementation here is that uh the
open AI realtime API it has its core
model that's listening and understanding
you but it uses a side model called

of what the user said that core model is
this fully integrated model that's able
to think about what it's hearing it's
operating in the sound domain it if you
clap or if you cough or if you bang on
the table and you ask it what you just
did it'll be able to tell you whisper
does not work that way whisper is
converting everything into text and so
uh you know if you clap you might get
some surprising results and so like this
is the result of me just not speaking I
just send some silence for a little a
while and despite the long conversation

Dippity but you know it said that I was
and this is not a great user experience
and there's no way to tune this there's
no uh you know if we were working with
um whisper at a low level there might be
things we can do here open AI realtime
API does not give you knobs to really

what we ended up introducing was

Suite over them and now we can get

of the types of people we'd be uh we'd
be
